name: Forgotten Explorer
description:
This game is based on memories of a weird old flash game that me and my brother used to play a little bit on some website. (Maybe the DisneyXD site?)

In this game you take control of a cheeky explorer who's searching the ruins for the Lost Jewel of Asmelike-khiz.

Will you survive this precarious platformer?

Can you survive the traps of the depressed mummies?

Probably not because I stink at level design...

Disclaimer: This game was built for a certain game jam... I just didn't finish it in time.  8(
